name: Coroverify
description: An open source initiative to help the users in gathering information regarding COVID-19.

name: Krishi Kalyan
description: A virtual marketplace which allows farmers to list their produced goods and interact with buyers directly.

name: Saavan '23 pre-launch website
description: A static website for the pre-launch of Saavan '23, the annual online-hosted fest of IITM BS student community.

name: Wobb prototype website
description: A static prototype website made as a freelance trial project.

name: Daostruct prototype website
description: A static prototype website made as a freelance trial project using NASA's API.

name: Flask blogger
description: A generic blogging site made using flask for the MAD1 project as part of the curriculum at IITM.

name: WhatsApp chat analyzer
description: A simple data engineering tool written using python to extract data from a given chat file from WhatsApp and get some stats.

name: Ticket booking system
description: A simple ticket booking portal for events made using flask as part of the MAD1 project for IITM coursework.

name: Grocery Store
description: A simple grocery store portal made using flask and vue.js as part of the MAD2 project for IITM coursework.
